message.body: Did u just send me nothing?
Er, didn't mean to if I did...sorry!
My friend bartends at the khyber tho.. sounds like a class trip to me!
Yea! I only have one free drink ticket tho :-(. Thought I had more....
I love the khyber we should totally go
Sweet, I'm down
Was going to grab wine for class.. r we gonna get judged
Haha, no
It's Elizabeth, she loves el vino
Oh Elizabeth is our profesora?
I have yr notebook.... Need it back? I can meetcha tomorrow....
Ha.. I know I got sidetracked by the bums.. its not important it only has my Spanish stuff in it.. if we get together b4 class ill get it otherwise if ur
downtown at some point let me know and ill come get it.
Coolcool, I can get it to you Sunday or Monday after 3
I can drop off yr folder whenever tomorrow... When works for you?
Thx I'm downtown all day like rittenhouse area so I can meet u whenever.. if u r coming downtown just let me know when/where and I will grab it then..
I'm just home all day, don't really have any plans. Maybe afternoon sometime? 1 or 2?
Ohhhh I don't want u going out of ur way.. if/when u leave the house shoot me a text.. I'm happy to meet u whenever
R u kidding.. well done.. I have absolutely no recollection of this
Yea.... It's easy!
You're not working tonight are you?
Nah.. tomorrow and sat
Elizabeth just called to ask if we can move class to thurs @ 6:30 or 7:30, Fri @ 6 or sat @ noon.. any preferences? Thurs might be bad for me but I'm not
sure yet
Friday @ 6 works for me, can't do the other times. Thanks!
Ok to Fri @ 6 for me.. M?
Didja hear back from Marija? Def no class tonight?
Did not hear fr M.. def no class I think but I need to get back to Elizabeth
Okey doke.... Hey, wanna come lay down some Spanish vocals tonight instead?
Ha-can't tonite but def a raincheck! M can't do Fri or sat so she says next wed-is that cool?
Yea, next Wednesday is fine, any time. Thanks!
Spanish 7:30 on Tuesday ok? I have yr homework
Haha.. yeah that's fine.. disregard my email then.. is it worth getting the hw before class?
Heya! Still wanna come over pre-boda?
Sorry again for zonking out! Yr camera is here just so ya know!
Ha.. it was a blast! We should start crashing weddings
Jaja, for sure! Next time Jeremy caters one we should go :-)
(seriously, yr vocals are so awesome! Makes mixing way more fun :-) )
Jaja, hit send on accident.... Creeme! We will have to record some more of you soon and you can listen!
So class is tonite, right?
Yes, I am 90% sure....
Ha.. I know-i started thinking it was next Monday
Maria is not coming either
Ack, so sorry about last night! We are so lame :-(
Haha.. no worries was just messing with u two.. it was actually a slow nite so u weren't the only homebodies.. also, when do u want to have class next? I
ended up going on Mon and had Morene.. she is soo amable
Aw, I love her! I can do any day except wednesday next week
Ok, i'll hit up Marija and get back to u.. saw porn for blind ppl on Bill Maher today-whaaat
Haha, whoa, that is crazy!!! We should all try to do brunch soon (maybe tomorrow?) and you will have to explain this
I may go to nj in the morning, but, if not, I'm down.. the blind porn was in braille and u will have to explain this
Haha.... Isn't that too much to do with yr hands? Zing!
How's Thursday for class? Anytime for me..
Works for me! Are you callin'?
I'll call.. what time?
Any is good!
Omg.. Thursday @ 5:30.. Senor Pedro.. it's real.. txt back ASAP to confirm
No way!!! Yay!!! Ultra confirm!!!
Lol.. what kind of show?
Okay.. I'm down.. how long is it?
Not sure... I'll check when I get home an letcha know!
I think it's 2 hours
Sounds good.. Thx
Hope you made it home ok! I have had shakira stuck in my head all day.....
Ha.. and sry for totally crashing ur nite-u guys need to start kicking me out.. oh n let me know if u can get tix to that show on Sunday-I'm down for a redo

Kick you out?? Wasn't I trying to get you to stay later?? :-). I don't think he can get an extra ticket for tomorrow, sorry :-(. But j says we should all hang again next Wednesday if yr down... As long as you don't try to leave early ;-)
Gonna go to Spanish at jet tonight?
Ohhh.. I do know this place.. r u planning on going?
Yup!
Sweet, see ya there!
Not gonna make it to Spanish :(
School called earlier to confirm class today at 5:30
Elizabeth just called, she thought class was at 5:30.. I thought 7:30.. she is calling me back
Class is canceled.. she apologized and put us in for next thurs at 7:30
I'm flexible for dinner K, i know u r helping move so maybe on the later side. Also, sent u both an email re places to go.. yay!
8 is no prob
Aw.. no prob
Thanks! Aw, well you'll be leaving Philly for good soon enough!
Keennnnny! Gonna meet up with yalls esta noche at l'etage.. let me know what time you're heading out..
Sweet! Lounge times....will do!
Also, Spanish school just called and want us to have class Monday at 6:30
We're at l'tage!
Yay! C u soooon...
K, what's up with tubing on Sunday.. are u still going, are there drivers?
Yea! I think we've got a driver and I'm gonna get a van. We'll meet at my place in the am!
Sweeet.. Matt and I would love to tag along.. 9am?
Yea! Bring drink/snacks, and we can stop on the way to buy you a tube if ya don't have one!
Ha.. oh ok-i thought u rent tubes..? And by drinks do u mean cocktails ;).. ?
You might be able to rent as well? I'll find out. They're like $15 to buy. And yes....cocktails, jars of moonshine, etc, etc :-)
Chea! I'm muy excited..
Yea!! So glad yr coming! Didja talk to the school about Monday? I haven't gotten a hold of anyone
Oh yeah-that's been on my mind.. I'll call right now
I'm calling this evening about the show if you want me to do it!
I just left a message.. but is u talk to a person might as well confirm
Will do!
Got snacks covered.. was wondering if u wanted to stop at the beer distributer, Stone I think, by you on the way up? But if u already got a case maybe i
'll just pick something up... thoughts?
Yea, there's one at 18th and spring, there's 10 people coming so maybe we need another case? If you just wanna bring something else that's fine too!
We are having a party for Morene
U dnt need to come
Aw, I'm sorry to miss it! Give her my regards for whatever occasion it is!
Btw, there's a Spanish language exchange at lucky strikes in half an hour, $20, free drink, you pair up with a native speaker for 10 mins at a time for 2 hours. Too expensive for me, just FYI!
Cool.. too rich for me too, it was Morene's bday so we had cake and wine and that was class... Elizabeth said to call to sched for next week.. Marija dnt
come either
Heya lady! Any word on yr end from Marija? My schedule is getting nuts with rehearsals...I hope we can have another class together before you leave!
Heya! No word from Maria-weird.. def want to have a class soon or at least get together with the both of you.. i'll give her a call.. how's the show comi
ng along?
Great! Busy, but good. We're going to take our couch surfer out to play pool later tonight if you and the fella wanna join!
Oh sweet.. I totally would but I'm still waiting to get on a train back to the city-had to go to NJ today-so I won't be back for awhile.. but if u have a
nother free nite this week let me kno...
Eek, forgota writecha back, sorry...no more free nights for me sadly, I'm overwhelmed with my water bears :-(. But we should all have one last get together!
